Text: If you don't speak spannish or enjoy spannish dubbing, you probably shouldn't download this. Unless you speak French, German and English (generally unintelligable Scotsmen), since the original audio consists of all three languages at different points in the movie.
Please who ever is seeding please stay a while, please let me download and i will seed after. please!
